name: Parallalel requests table
description: A table that demonstrate how to make requests in parallel

options.title: Fetching pokemon data in parallel
options.rows: <${ return this.remoteResourcesStates?.results?.POKEMON_PARALLEL.REMOTE_RESOURCE?.result?.map(({ id, name, height, weight, types }) => ([id, name, height, weight, types.map(typeObj => typeObj.type.name).join(', ')])) ?? [] }$>
